definitionGroups.group: (vulgar, slang) An erect penis. [from mid-20th c.]

entries.meaning: (vulgar, slang, figurative) An often perverse sense of enjoyment from or predilection towards something.
examples: Why do politicians have such a boner for meaningless memorials?

entries.meaning: (literally) One who or that which bones (removes bones).
(dated slang, especially baseball) A blunder; a silly mistake. [from early 20th c.]
examples: He really pulled a boner that time!
